text: Microtropis sarawakensis is a species of plant in the family Celastraceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo where it is confined to Sarawak. ==References== sarawakensis Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Flora of Sarawak Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Microtropis sarawakensis
